    • Method Detail

      • getBusyIcon

        public Icon getBusyIcon(boolean isTabSelected)
        Description copied from class: BusyTabsSupport
        An icon that can be shown in busy tab's header to indicate some lengthy process is being run in it. The default implementation ensures the icon is properly animated.
        Specified by:
        getBusyIcon in class BusyTabsSupport
        Parameters:
        isTabSelected - True to get icon for a selected tab, false to get icon for regular tab state.
        Returns:
        Busy-like icon.

      • tick

        protected void tick()
        Description copied from class: BusyTabsSupport
        Invoked between each repaint events. The default implementation animates the busy icon in this method.
        Specified by:
        tick in class BusyTabsSupport

      • getRepaintTimerIntervalMillis

        protected int getRepaintTimerIntervalMillis()
        Specified by:
        getRepaintTimerIntervalMillis in class BusyTabsSupport
        Returns:
        The time in milliseconds between repaints of busy tabs. Value of zero means there are no repeated repaints.
